entry.title: Flood Warning issued September 09 at 11:51AM AKDT by NWS

entry.summary: ...OZONE HIGH POLLUTION ADVISORY FOR MARICOPA COUNTY INCLUDING THE PHOENIX METRO AREA SATURDAY... The Arizona Department of Environmental Quality (ADEQ) has issued an Ozone High Pollution Advisory for the Phoenix Metro Area on Saturday. This means that forecast weather conditions combined with existing ozone levels are expected to result in local maximum 8-hour ozone
